Grouped_Utterances: Hi, Ellie! I’ve been okay, I guess. I wrote that letter to my dad, and it felt good to get it out.

It was really freeing. I felt like I could finally say everything I wanted without worrying about his reaction.   I did! He was really touched, and it opened up a conversation between us.   We talked about his feelings, and he opened up a bit about his fears. It was nice to see him vulnerable.   It made me feel closer to him. I think it helped both of us to be honest.   I feel a bit lighter, like I’m not carrying as much weight.   I still worry, but I think talking about it has helped me find some peace.   It’s been busy! I’ve had more auditions, which is exciting but also stressful.   I feel relieved afterward, no matter the outcome. It’s like a weight is lifted.
I’ve been talking to my friends more, and they’ve been really supportive. It feels good to lean on them.   I think so. I feel like I’m connecting with them on a deeper level.
Yes, I’ve been doing the muscle relaxation before bed, and it’s been helping me sleep better.   Actually, I’ve had a couple, but they weren’t as intense as before.
I try to keep a routine and remind myself it’s just part of the process.
I’ve started doing some breathing exercises before I go in. It helps calm my nerves.

I’d like to explore more roles that challenge me and step out of my comfort zone.   I’d love to try something dramatic. I usually do more comedic roles, so I think it would be a good change.   Yes, I’d like to take a class focused on dramatic acting in the next month.   I’d like to continue working on my relaxation techniques and start researching classes for dramatic acting.
